title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4052.3 - Hurdles in hurdle course
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4052.3 - Hurdles in hurdle course

State Regulations

In all hurdle courses there shall be at least four
flights of hurdles in the first mile, with an additional flight of hurdles for
every quarter of a mile or part thereof beyond that distance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4052.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
